title: Nightfall
description:
Originally published: New York, Doubleday, 1990
"This novel is based on the short "Night Fall" by Isaac Asimov which first appeared in "Astounding Science Fiction" in 1941 ..." t.p. verso
An expanded version of Asimov's short story, "Nightfall," reveals a world on the brink of chaos, torn between religious fanaticism and scientific denial and faced with the end of civilization
creator:
Asimov, Isaac, 1920-1992
Silverberg, Robert
